Verwendungen von Schnittstelle
opennlp.tools.sentdetect.SentenceDetector

Packages, die SentenceDetector verwenden
Package
Beschreibung
opennlp.tools.formats.brat
Experimental package related to the corpus format used by the "brat rapid annotation tool" (brat).
opennlp.tools.sentdetect
Package related to identifying sentence boundaries.

  • Verwendungen von SentenceDetector in opennlp.tools.sentdetect

    Klassen in opennlp.tools.sentdetect, die SentenceDetector implementieren
    Modifizierer und Typ
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    class 
    NewlineSentenceDetector
    The Newline SentenceDetector assumes that sentences are line delimited and recognizes one sentence per non-empty line.
    class 
    SentenceDetectorME
    A sentence detector for splitting up raw text into sentences.
    class 
    ThreadSafeSentenceDetectorME
    A thread-safe version of SentenceDetectorME.
